comments.en:
Thermal printer, paper size A6 or 10.5 cm wide roll paper.

This printer is mainly intended to use with PDAs. It is is very compact (only 15 x 10 x 2.5 cm or 6 x 4 x 1 inches) and can be run with batteries.

Connectian via serial port.

See setup instructions on the driver page.

Consumables/Refills: Thermal Paper, sheets A6 or roll 10.5 cm wide
